  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from django.contrib.sitemaps import Sitemap
  4. def from_iterable(iterables):
  5. """
  6. Backport of itertools.chain.from_iterable
  7. """
  8. for it in iterables:
  9. for element in it:
  10. yield element
  12. class CMSSitemap(Sitemap):
  13. changefreq = "monthly"
  14. priority = 0.5
  16. def items(self):
  17. from cms.utils.moderator import get_page_queryset
  18. page_queryset = get_page_queryset(None)
  19. all_pages = page_queryset.published().filter(login_required=False)
  20. return all_pages
  22. def lastmod(self, page):
  23. modification_dates = [page.changed_date, page.publication_date]
  24. plugins_for_placeholder = lambda placeholder: placeholder.cmsplugin_set.all()
  25. plugins = from_iterable(map(plugins_for_placeholder, page.placeholders.all()))
  26. plugin_modification_dates = map(lambda plugin: plugin.changed_date, plugins)
  27. modification_dates.extend(plugin_modification_dates)
  28. return max(modification_dates)
